alert.note: Alert for Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 04 at 5:58AM PDT until November 04 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow above 4000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon and Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
